sentences.cn: ...在中非的一次沿河而上的旅行。

sentences.en: As the boat sails upriver, the landscape is spectacular.
sentences.cn: 随着船沿江而上, 沿途的风景引人入胜.

sentences.en: Beginning in March, the fish start the arduous journey 800 kilometers upriver from the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.cn: 三月初,大马哈鱼就会从太平洋向上游, 开始一段800公里的费力的旅途.

sentences.en: Such upriver manufacturers are willing our lower stock price.
sentences.cn: 这样上游厂商就愿意给我们更低的进货价.

sentences.en: The steamboat could sail upriver, against the flow.
